name: Push-Up
description: A basic upper body exercise that strengthens the chest, shoulders, and triceps.
instructions: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground.
Push back up to the starting position.
tips: Keep your body straight throughout the movement.
Inhale as you lower yourself, exhale as you push up.

name: Squat
description: A lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower your hips back and down, as if sitting in a chair.
Keep your chest up and knees behind your toes.
Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
tips: Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Inhale as you lower down, exhale as you rise.

name: Plank
description: An isometric exercise that strengthens the core, shoulders, and back.
instructions: Start in a forearm plank position, with elbows directly under shoulders.
Keep your body straight from head to heels.
Hold the position for the desired amount of time.
tips: Engage your core and glutes to maintain a straight line.
Breathe steadily throughout the exercise.

name: Deadlift
description: A compound lift that works the lower back, glutes, hamstrings, and traps.
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, barbell on the ground in front of you.
Hinge at your hips and knees to grab the bar with a shoulder-width grip.
Lift the bar by straightening your hips and knees, keeping the bar close to your body.
Lower the bar back to the ground with control.
tips: Keep your back flat and chest up.
Inhale before lifting, exhale as you stand.

name: Bicep Curl
description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding dumbbells at your sides.
Curl the weights towards your shoulders while keeping your elbows stationary.
Lower the weights back down with control.
tips: Avoid swinging the weights; focus on muscle contraction.
Exhale as you lift, inhale as you lower.

name: Lunge
description: A versatile lower body exercise that works the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.
instructions: Stand with feet together, step one leg forward and lower your hips.
Bend both knees to 90 degrees, keeping your front knee behind your toes.
Push through your front heel to return to the starting position.
tips: Keep your torso upright.
Inhale as you lower down, exhale as you stand back up.

name: Bench Press
description: A compound upper body exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps.
instructions: Lie on a bench with feet flat on the ground.
Grip the barbell with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Lower the bar to your chest, then press it back up.
tips: Keep your elbows slightly tucked.
Exhale as you press the bar up, inhale as you lower it.

name: Shoulder Press
description: An exercise that targets the shoulders and upper arms.
instructions: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height.
Press the weights overhead until arms are fully extended.
Lower the weights back to the starting position.
tips: Keep your core tight and back straight.
Exhale as you press up, inhale as you lower.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: A back exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi and biceps.
instructions: Sit at a lat pulldown machine with a wide grip on the bar.
Pull the bar down to your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Slowly return the bar to the starting position.
tips: Avoid swinging your body.
Exhale as you pull down, inhale as you release.

name: Tricep Dips
description: An exercise targeting the triceps, shoulders, and chest.
instructions: Position your hands on a bench behind you with feet extended.
Lower your body by bending your elbows.
Push back up to the starting position.
tips: Keep your elbows close to your body.
Exhale as you push up, inhale as you lower.

name: Pull-Up
description: An upper body exercise that primarily targets the back and biceps.
instructions: Hang from a bar with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar.
Lower yourself back down with control.
tips: Engage your core and avoid swinging.
Exhale as you pull up, inhale as you lower.

name: Leg Press
description: A lower body exercise targeting the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.
instructions: Sit on a leg press machine with feet shoulder-width apart on the platform.
Push the platform away by extending your legs.
Slowly return to the starting position.
tips: Keep your feet flat and knees in line with your toes.
Exhale as you push, inhale as you return.

name: Leg Raise
description: An exercise that targets the lower abdominal muscles.
instructions: Lie on your back with legs straight.
Lift your legs towards the ceiling, keeping them straight.
Slowly lower your legs back down without touching the ground.
tips: Keep your lower back pressed into the floor.
Exhale as you lift, inhale as you lower.

name: Calf Raise
description: An exercise that targets the calf muscles.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointed forward.
Raise your heels off the ground, balancing on the balls of your feet.
Lower your heels back to the ground.
tips: Keep your legs straight.
Exhale as you lift, inhale as you lower.

name: Chest Fly
description: An isolation exercise that targets the pectoral muscles.
instructions: Lie on a bench with dumbbells in hand, arms extended above chest.
Lower the dumbbells to the sides, keeping a slight bend in the elbows.
Bring the dumbbells back together above your chest.
tips: Keep your elbows slightly bent throughout.
Exhale as you bring the weights together, inhale as you lower.

name: Seated Row
description: An exercise that targets the back muscles, particularly the rhomboids and lats.
instructions: Sit at a cable row machine with feet on the footrests.
Pull the handle towards your torso, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Slowly return to the starting position.
tips: Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Exhale as you pull, inhale as you return.

name: Russian Twist
description: An exercise that targets the oblique muscles.
instructions: Sit on the ground with knees bent, lean back slightly.
Hold a weight or a medicine ball, twist your torso to one side, then the other.
Keep your core engaged and back straight.
tips: Move slowly and with control.
Exhale as you twist, inhale as you return to center.

name: Burpee
description: A full-body exercise that combines a squat, push-up, and jump.
instructions: Start standing, drop into a squat and place your hands on the ground.
Jump your feet back into a plank position and perform a push-up.
Jump your feet back towards your hands, then jump into the air.
tips: Keep your core tight throughout the movement.
Exhale as you jump, inhale as you lower.

name: Bicycle Crunch
description: An exercise that targets the abdominal muscles, particularly the obliques.
instructions: Lie on your back with hands behind your head.
Lift your knees to 90 degrees, bring opposite elbow to opposite knee.
Alternate sides, mimicking a pedaling motion.
tips: Keep your lower back pressed into the floor.
Exhale as you twist, inhale as you switch sides.

name: Mountain Climber
description: A full-body exercise that primarily targets the core muscles.
instructions: Start in a plank position.
Bring one knee towards your chest, then switch legs.
Continue alternating legs in a running motion.
tips: Keep your core tight and back straight.
Breathe steadily throughout the exercise.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
description: An exercise targeting the chest and back muscles.
instructions: Lie on a bench with a dumbbell in both hands.
Lower the weight behind your head, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Pull the weight back over your chest.
tips: Keep your core engaged and back flat on the bench.
Exhale as you pull the weight up, inhale as you lower.
